en.national_indicators_available:
• Inpatient treatment of substance use disorders
  • Estimate of high risk use (based on treatment entrants) of the substances opioids, cocaine, and other stimulants in the age group 15 to under 65 years
en.comparison_sdg: The time series are partly compliant with the UN metadata.

en.indicator_name: Coverage of treatment interventions (pharmacological, psychosocial and rehabilitation and aftercare services) for substance use disorders
en.target_name: Strengthen the prevention and treatment of substance abuse, including narcotic drug abuse and harmful use of alcohol
